text: Ezɨ God ghaze, “Gumazamiziba angamɨra ikiasa kɨ uan Duam me gatɨ. Ezɨ men mɨkarziba nguazir kamɨn biziba, kamaghɨn kɨ uan Duamɨn amamangatɨghtɨ, a me ko dughiar ruarimɨn ikian kogham.6:3 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn me 120plan azenibara ikegh egh ovengam.”
